description: This file contains an example script demonstrating the use of the Exa research tool within an AI agent framework. It sets up an agent with specific models and tools, provides instructions for research tasks, and performs a sample research query on GPUs. The code includes commented-out schema definitions for structured research output.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with models, tools, and instructions for performing research tasks.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the agent to perform a research query and output the results.
